page.title: 08Langham School
page.content: Langham School.{ { }Langham school starts at 8.45 am. The uniform is red and grey. There are three classes and three teachers. In the first class there are twenty pupils aged from five to seven. The second class has twenty three pupils with an age range of seven to nine.The last class has twenty two pupils with ages from nine to eleven. They have a mid-morning break and a lunch hour. The sports in winter are football and netball, with rounders in the summer term. They have P.E facilities in the hall, which consists of stools, planks and horses. They have four computers which are "zx 81". The school dinners are cooked on the school premises.Approximately eighteen have packed lunches. The secondary catchment school is "St Helena's" in Colchester.
